mean_cn: n. 不满；  adj. 不满的
mean_en: a feeling of being unhappy because you are not satisfied with a particular situation; something that makes you have this feeling
sentence: From the look on their faces, you could see their discontent at the food they were given.
sentence_trans: 从他们表情可以看出他们对被提供的食物非常不满。
word_etyma: dis不 + con全部 + tent拿住 → 不能全部拿住 → discontent不满足的
